data.current_description: Retrieves the list of fonts currently served by the Google Fonts Developer API.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve available web fonts from Google Fonts
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete list of web fonts currently served by the Google Fonts API. Supports filtering and sorting through optional parameters to narrow results by category, script, or other criteria. Returns a WebfontList object containing metadata for each font family, including available variants, axes for variable fonts, and other font properties. No authentication required.
